sentences.zh: 王者制事立法，物度軌則，壹稟於六律，六律為萬事根本焉。

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, one receive from six pitchpipes, six pitchpipes are ten thousand affairs root there.
translations.idiomatic: Kings establish affairs and make laws; things measure tracks and rules—all receive from the six pitchpipes. The six pitchpipes are the root of ten thousand affairs.

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, all receive from six pitches, six pitches are ten thousand affairs root.

sentences.zh: 其於兵械尤所重，故云「望敵知吉凶，聞聲效勝負」，百王不易之道也。

translations.literal: Its at weapons especially what heavy, therefore say "gaze enemy know auspicious inauspicious, hear sound imitate victory defeat", hundred kings unchanging way also.
translations.idiomatic: It is especially important for military weapons. Therefore it is said: 'Gaze at the enemy to know auspicious and inauspicious; hear the sound to imitate victory and defeat.' This is the unchanging way of the hundred kings.

translations.literal: Their regard for weapons especially heavy, thus said 'look at enemy know good bad, hear sound know victory defeat', hundred kings unchanging way.

sentences.zh: 武王伐紂，吹律聽聲，推孟春以至于季冬，殺氣相并，而音尚宮。

translations.literal: Wu King attacked Zhou, blew pitchpipes listened sound, extended first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually joined, but sound still palace.
translations.idiomatic: When King Wu attacked Zhou, he blew the pitchpipes and listened to the sounds, extending from the first month of spring to the last month of winter. The killing qi mutually joined, but the sound still favored gong.

sentences.zh: 同聲相從，物之自然，何足怪哉？

translations.literal: Same sound mutually follow, things natural, what sufficient strange?
translations.idiomatic: Like sounds mutually follow each other; this is the natural way of things. What is there to be surprised about?

translations.literal: Wu Wang attacked Zhou, blew pitches listened to sound, pushed first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually combined, sound still gong. Same sound mutually follow, things' natural, what sufficient to wonder?

sentences.zh: 兵者，聖人所以討彊暴，平亂世，夷險阻，救危殆。

translations.literal: Weapons, sages thus punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangerous obstacles, save perilous dangerous.
translations.idiomatic: Weapons are what sages use to punish the strong and violent, pacify chaotic ages, level dangerous obstacles, and save perilous dangers.

sentences.zh: 自含（血）［齒］戴角之獸見犯則校，而況於人懷好惡喜怒之氣？

translations.literal: From contain teeth wear horns beasts see offense then fight, moreover about people harbor likes dislikes joy anger qi?
translations.idiomatic: Even beasts that contain teeth and wear horns fight when they see offense. How much more so for people who harbor the qi of likes, dislikes, joy, and anger?

sentences.zh: 喜則愛心生，怒則毒螫加，情性之理也。

translations.literal: Happy then love heart born, angry then poison sting add, feelings nature principle also.
translations.idiomatic: When happy, then loving hearts are born; when angry, then poisonous stings are added. This is the principle of feelings and nature.

translations.literal: Warriors, sages use to punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangers obstacles, save peril crisis. From containing teeth wearing horns beasts see violation then fight, moreover concerning people harboring likes dislikes happy angry qi? Happy then loving heart born, angry then poisonous sting added, feelings nature's principle.

sentences.zh: 昔黃帝有涿鹿之戰，以定火災；

translations.literal: Former Yellow Emperor had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster;
translations.idiomatic: Formerly the Yellow Emperor had the battle of Zhuolu, to settle the fire disaster.

sentences.zh: 顓頊有共工之陳，以平水害；

translations.literal: Zhuanxu had Gonggong battle array, to pacify water harm;
translations.idiomatic: Zhuanxu had the battle array of Gonggong, to pacify the water harm.

sentences.zh: 成湯有南巢之伐，以殄夏亂。

translations.literal: Cheng Tang had Nanchao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos.
translations.idiomatic: Cheng Tang had the attack on Nanchao, to exterminate the Xia chaos.

sentences.zh: 遞興遞廢，勝者用事，所受於天也。

translations.literal: Alternately rise alternately abandon, victors use affairs, what received from heaven also.
translations.idiomatic: They alternately rise and alternately are abandoned; the victors use affairs. This is what is received from Heaven.

translations.literal: Former Huang Di had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster; Zhuan Xu had Gong Gong battle array, to pacify water harm; Cheng Tang had Nan Chao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos. Successively rise successively waste, victors use affairs, received from heaven.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，名士迭興，晉用咎犯，而齊用王子，吳用孫武，申明軍約，賞罰必信，卒伯諸侯，兼列邦土，雖不及三代之誥誓，然身寵君尊，當世顯揚，可不謂榮焉？

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars alternately rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, and Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, explained clear army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, troops hegemon feudal lords, combined listed state lands, though not reach three dynasties declarations oaths, however body favored lord honored, current age famous raised, can not call glory there?
translations.idiomatic: From this time onward, famous scholars alternately rose. Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu. They explained and clarified army covenants; rewards and punishments were trustworthy. Their troops became hegemons among the feudal lords, combining and listing the lands of the states. Though they did not reach the declarations and oaths of the Three Dynasties, nevertheless their persons were favored and their lords honored; they were famous and raised up in the current age. Can this not be called glory?

sentences.zh: 豈與世儒闇於大較，不權輕重，猥云德化，不當用兵，大至君辱失守，小乃侵犯削弱，遂執不移等哉！

translations.literal: How with world Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, foolishly say virtue transformation, not proper use weapons, great to lord humiliated lose defense, small then invade weaken, then hold not move equal!
translations.idiomatic: How can this compare with the Confucians of the world who are dark about the great outline, do not weigh light and heavy, foolishly speak of virtue transformation and say it is not proper to use weapons? In the great case, the lord is humiliated and loses his defense; in the small case, one is invaded and weakened. Then they hold to it unchangingly!

sentences.zh: 笔教笞不可廢於家，刑罰不可捐於國，誅伐不可偃於天下，用之有巧拙，行之有逆順耳。

translations.literal: Writing teaching cane cannot abandon in family, punishments cannot discard in state, executions attacks cannot rest in realm, use have skillful clumsy, carry out have contrary compliant ears.
translations.idiomatic: Writing, teaching, and caning cannot be abandoned in the family; punishments cannot be discarded in the state; executions and attacks cannot rest in the realm. Using them has skillful and clumsy; carrying them out has contrary and compliant.

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars successively rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declared army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, finally hegemon feudal lords, annexed column state lands, though not reach three dynasties' announcements oaths, yet body honored lord respected, contemporary illustrious praised, can not call glorious? How with worldly Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, vile speak virtue transformation, not appropriate use troops, great to lord insulted lost defense, small then invaded diminished weakened, then held not move etc! Writing teaching cane cannot waste in home, punishments cannot abandon in state, executions cannot cease in world, use has skillful clumsy, carry has reverse proper only.

sentences.zh: 夏桀、殷紂手搏豺狼，足追四馬，勇非微也；

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled jackals wolves, feet chased four horses, bravery not small also;
translations.idiomatic: Xia Jie and Yin Zhou wrestled the jackals and wolves with their hands, chased the four horses with their feet—their bravery was not small.

sentences.zh: 百戰克勝，諸侯懾服，權非輕也。

translations.literal: Hundred battles overcome victory, feudal lords awed submit, authority not light also.
translations.idiomatic: They fought a hundred battles and overcame in victory; the feudal lords were awed and submitted—their authority was not light.

sentences.zh: 秦二世宿軍無用之地，連兵於邊陲，力非弱也；

translations.literal: Qin Second Generation stationed army useless lands, connected weapons at borders, strength not weak also;
translations.idiomatic: Qin Second Generation stationed armies in useless lands, connected weapons at the borders—their strength was not weak.

sentences.zh: 結怨匈奴，絓禍於越，勢非寡也。

translations.literal: Formed resentment Xiongnu, implicated calamity in Yue, influence not few also.
translations.idiomatic: They formed resentment with the Xiongnu, implicated calamity in Yue—their influence was not few.

sentences.zh: 及其威盡勢極，閭巷之人為敵國，咎生窮武之不知足，甘得之心不息也。

translations.literal: Until their awe exhausted influence extreme, alley lane people became enemy states, blame born from exhausting martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not cease also.
translations.idiomatic: When their awe was exhausted and their influence extreme, the people of the alleys and lanes became enemy states. The blame was born from exhausting the martial without knowing sufficiency; the heart of sweet gain did not cease.

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled wolves boars, feet pursued four horses, brave not slight; Hundred battles victorious, feudal lords awed submitted, power not light. Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops useless places, connected troops at borders, strength not weak; Tied resentment Xiongnu, entangled calamity Yue, momentum not few. When authority exhausted momentum extreme, alley people became enemy state, fault born from martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not rest.

sentences.zh: 高祖有天下，三邊外畔；

translations.literal: Gaozu possessed realm, three borders external rebelled;
translations.idiomatic: When Gaozu possessed the realm, the three borders externally rebelled.

sentences.zh: 大國之王雖稱蕃輔，臣節未盡。

translations.literal: Great states kings though called screen auxiliaries, minister conduct not complete.
translations.idiomatic: The kings of the great states, though called screen auxiliaries, did not complete their ministerly conduct.

sentences.zh: 會高祖厭苦軍事，亦有蕭、張之謀，故偃武一休息，羈縻不備。

translations.literal: Met Gaozu tired bitter military affairs, also had Xiao, Zhang plans, therefore rested martial one rest, restraint bridle not complete.
translations.idiomatic: It happened that Gaozu was tired and bitter about military affairs, and also had the plans of Xiao and Zhang. Therefore he rested the martial and took one rest, restraining and bridling but not completely.

translations.literal: Gao Zu had world, three borders outside rebelled; Great states' kings though called auxiliary support, minister conduct not complete. Met Gao Zu weary bitter military affairs, also had Xiao Zhang plans, thus ceased martial one rest, restrained not prepared.

sentences.zh: 歷至孝文即位，將軍陳武等議曰：「南越、朝鮮自全秦時內屬為臣子，後且擁兵阻阸，選蠕觀望。

translations.literal: Passed to Filial Wen ascended throne, General Chen Wu etc discussed saying: "Nanyue, Chaoxian from complete Qin time internally belonged as minister children, later moreover held weapons blocked defiles, selected moved observed waited."
translations.idiomatic: When it passed to Filial Wen's ascension to the throne, General Chen Wu and others discussed, saying: 'Nanyue and Chaoxian, from the complete Qin time, internally belonged as minister children. Later they moreover held weapons, blocked defiles, and selected and moved while observing and waiting.'

sentences.zh: 高祖時天下新定，人民小安，未可復興兵。

translations.literal: Gaozu time realm newly settled, people slightly peaceful, not able again raise weapons.
translations.idiomatic: In Gaozu's time, the realm was newly settled; the people were slightly peaceful. It was not possible to again raise weapons.

sentences.zh: 今陛下仁惠撫百姓，恩澤加海內，宜及士民樂用，征討逆黨，以一封疆。」

translations.literal: Now Your Majesty benevolent kind caress common people, grace moisture add realm within, should take advantage scholar people happy use, campaign attack rebellious faction, to unify borders."
translations.idiomatic: Now Your Majesty is benevolent and kind, caressing the common people; grace and moisture are added within the realm. It is appropriate to take advantage while the scholars and people are happy to be used, to campaign and attack the rebellious faction, to unify the borders.'

sentences.zh: 孝文曰：「朕能任衣冠，念不到此。

translations.literal: Filial Wen said: "I can bear the cap gown, thought not reach this."
translations.idiomatic: Filial Wen said: 'I can bear the cap and gown, but my thoughts do not reach this.'

sentences.zh: 會呂氏之亂，功臣宗室共不羞恥，誤居正位，常戰戰慄慄，恐事之不終。

translations.literal: Met Lü clan chaos, meritorious ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, mistakenly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling fearful, feared matters not end.
translations.idiomatic: I met the Lü clan's chaos; the meritorious ministers and clan relatives together were not ashamed, mistakenly occupied the correct positions, constantly trembling and fearful, fearing that matters would not end.

sentences.zh: 且兵凶器，雖克所願，動亦秏病，謂百姓遠方何？

translations.literal: Moreover weapons ominous tools, though overcome wished, move also consume illness, say common people distant places what?
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, weapons are ominous tools. Though one overcomes what is wished, moving also consumes and causes illness. What about the common people and distant places?

sentences.zh: 又先帝知勞民不可煩，故不以為意。

translations.literal: Also former emperor knew tiring people not able trouble, therefore not considered it.
translations.idiomatic: Also, the former emperor knew that tiring the people cannot be troubled; therefore he did not consider it.

sentences.zh: 朕豈自謂能？

translations.literal: I how self say able?
translations.idiomatic: How can I myself say I am able?

sentences.zh: 今匈奴內侵，軍吏無功，邊民父子荷兵日久，朕常為動心傷痛，無日忘之。

translations.literal: Now Xiongnu internally invade, military officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget it.
translations.idiomatic: Now the Xiongnu internally invade; the military officials have no merit; the border people, fathers and sons, carry weapons for days long. I am constantly moved in heart and pained; there is no day I forget it.

sentences.zh: 今未能銷距，願且堅邊設候，結和通使，休寧北陲，為功多矣。

translations.literal: Now not able melt distance, wish moreover strengthen border set scouts, form peace connect envoys, rest peaceful northern border, for merit much already.
translations.idiomatic: Now I am not able to melt the distance. I wish moreover to strengthen the border and set scouts, form peace and connect envoys, rest and pacify the northern border—this would be much merit already.

sentences.zh: 且無議軍。」

translations.literal: Moreover no discuss military."
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, do not discuss military affairs.'

sentences.zh: 故百姓無內外之繇，得息肩於田畝，天下殷富，粟至十餘錢，鳴雞吠狗，煙火萬里，可謂和樂者乎！

translations.literal: Therefore common people no internal external corvee, obtain rest shoulders in fields acres, realm abundant rich, millet reach ten several cash, crowing roosters barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy ones!
translations.idiomatic: Therefore the common people had no internal or external corvee; they obtained rest for their shoulders in the fields and acres. The realm was abundant and rich; millet reached ten and several cash. Crowing roosters and barking dogs, smoke and fires for ten thousand li—can this be called harmonious and happy!

translations.literal: Continued to Xiao Wen ascended throne, generals Chen Wu etc discussed: 'Nan Yue, Chao Xian from complete Qin time inner belonged as minister children, after moreover held troops blocked passes, wriggling watching. Gao Zu time world newly settled, people small peaceful, not could again raise troops. Now Your Majesty benevolent gracious caressed hundred families, favor moisture added within seas, appropriate reach scholar people happy use, attack rebellious parties, to unify borders.' Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear robe hat, thought not reach this. Met Lu clan chaos, merit ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling trembling, feared affairs not end. Moreover troops ominous instruments, though conquer wished, move also exhaust illness, say hundred families far places what? Also former emperor knew toil people cannot trouble, thus not took as intent. I how self say able? Now Xiongnu inner invade, army officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget. Now not able dissolve defense, wish moreover strengthen borders set scouts, tie peace connect envoys, rest peaceful north borders, for merit many. Moreover no discuss troops.' Thus hundred families no inner outer corvee, got rest shoulders at fields, world prosperous rich, grain to ten plus cash, crowing cocks barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy!

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：文帝時，會天下新去湯火，人民樂業，因其欲然，能不擾亂，故百姓遂安。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen Emperor time, met realm newly gone hot water, people happy occupations, followed their desires thus, able not disturb chaos, therefore common people then peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: In Emperor Wen's time, it happened that the realm had newly gone from hot water; the people were happy in their occupations. Following their desires thus, he was able not to disturb and cause chaos; therefore the common people then became peaceful.

sentences.zh: 自年六七十翁亦未嘗至市井，游敖嬉戲如小兒狀。

translations.literal: Even year sixty seventy old men also never reached marketplaces, strolled played frolicked like children appearance.
translations.idiomatic: Even old men of sixty and seventy years also never reached the marketplaces; they strolled, played, and frolicked like children in appearance.

sentences.zh: 孔子所稱有德君子者邪！

translations.literal: Confucius what praised virtuous gentleman ones!
translations.idiomatic: This is what Confucius praised as the virtuous gentleman!

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen emperor time, met world newly left cauldrons fires, people happy occupations, followed their wish thus, could not disturb chaos, thus hundred families then peaceful. From age sixty seventy old men also not tasted to market wells, roam play frolic like children appearance. Confucius called virtuous gentleman ones!

sentences.zh: 《書》曰［七正］，二十八舍。

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodgings.
translations.idiomatic: The Book says: 'Seven corrects, twenty-eight lodgings.'

sentences.zh: 律歷，天所以通五行八正之氣，天所以成孰萬物也。

translations.literal: Pitchpipes calendar, heaven thus connect five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus complete mature ten thousand things also.
translations.idiomatic: Pitchpipes and calendar: Heaven thus connects the qi of the five phases and eight corrects; Heaven thus completes and matures the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 舍者，日月所舍。

translations.literal: Lodging ones, sun moon what lodge.
translations.idiomatic: The lodgings are where the sun and moon lodge.

sentences.zh: 舍者，舒氣也。

translations.literal: Lodging ones, relax qi also.
translations.idiomatic: The lodgings are that which relaxes the qi.

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodges. Pitch calendar, heaven thus connects five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus completes ripens ten thousand things. Lodges, sun moon lodged. Lodges, loose qi.

sentences.zh: 不周風居西北，主殺生。

translations.literal: Imperfect wind dwells northwest, governs killing living.
translations.idiomatic: The Imperfect Wind dwells in the northwest; it governs killing and living.

sentences.zh: 東壁居不周風東，主辟生氣而東之。

translations.literal: Eastern wall dwells imperfect wind east, governs avoid living qi and east it.
translations.idiomatic: Eastern Wall dwells east of the Imperfect Wind; it governs avoiding the living qi and sending it east.

sentences.zh: 至於營室。

translations.literal: Until camp room.
translations.idiomatic: It reaches Camp Room.

sentences.zh: 營室者，主營胎陽氣而產之。

translations.literal: Camp room ones, govern nurture embryo yang qi and produce it.
translations.idiomatic: Camp Room is that which governs nurturing the embryo yang qi and producing it.

sentences.zh: 東至于危。

translations.literal: East until Wei.
translations.idiomatic: It goes east until Wei.

sentences.zh: 危，垝也。

translations.literal: Wei, danger also.
translations.idiomatic: Wei means danger.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣之（危）垝，故曰危。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi of danger, therefore called Wei.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of the yang qi's danger; therefore it is called Wei.

sentences.zh: 十月也，律中應鐘。

translations.literal: Tenth month also, pitchpipe middle Yingzhong.
translations.idiomatic: The tenth month: the pitchpipe in the middle is Yingzhong.

sentences.zh: 應鐘者，陽氣之應，不用事也。

translations.literal: Yingzhong ones, yang qi respond, not use affairs also.
translations.idiomatic: Yingzhong is the response of the yang qi; it does not use affairs.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為亥。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is hai.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches, it is hai.

sentences.zh: 亥者，該也。

translations.literal: Hai ones, encompass also.
translations.idiomatic: Hai means to encompass.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣藏於下，故該也。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi hide below, therefore encompass also.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of the yang qi hiding below; therefore it encompasses.

translations.literal: Not Zhou wind dwells northwest, governs killing birth. Dong Bi dwells Not Zhou wind east, governs open birth qi east it. To Ying Shi. Ying Shi, governs camp fetal yang qi produce it. East to Wei. Wei, wei. Speak yang qi wei wei, thus called Wei. Tenth month, pitch middle Ying Zhong. Ying Zhong, yang qi response, not use affairs. Its at twelve branches for Hai. Hai, contain. Speak yang qi store at below, thus contain.

sentences.zh: 廣莫風居北方。

translations.literal: Guangmo wind dwells northern.
translations.idiomatic: The Guangmo Wind dwells in the north.

sentences.zh: 廣莫者，言陽氣在下，陰莫陽廣大也，故曰廣莫。

translations.literal: Guangmo ones, speak yang qi in below, yin none yang vast great also, therefore called Guangmo.
translations.idiomatic: Guangmo speaks of the yang qi being below; when yin is none, yang is vast and great. Therefore it is called Guangmo.

sentences.zh: 東至於虛。

translations.literal: East until Xu.
translations.idiomatic: It goes east until Xu.

sentences.zh: 虛者，能實能虛，言陽氣冬則宛藏於虛，日冬至則一陰下藏，一陽上舒，故曰虛。

translations.literal: Xu ones, able solid able empty, speak yang qi winter then curled hide in Xu, sun winter solstice then one yin below hide, one yang above relax, therefore called Xu.
translations.idiomatic: Xu is able to be solid and able to be empty. It speaks of the yang qi in winter then curling and hiding in Xu. On the day of the winter solstice, then one yin hides below, one yang relaxes above. Therefore it is called Xu.

sentences.zh: 東至于須女。

translations.literal: East until Xu Nu.
translations.idiomatic: It goes east until Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 言萬物變動其所，陰陽氣未相離，尚相［如］胥［如］也，故曰須女。

translations.literal: Speak ten thousand things change move their place, yin yang qi not yet mutually separate, still mutually like Xu like also, therefore called Xu Nu.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of the ten thousand things changing and moving their place; the yin and yang qi have not yet mutually separated; they still mutually assist each other. Therefore it is called Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 十一月也，律中黃鐘。

translations.literal: Eleventh month also, pitchpipe middle Huangzhong.
translations.idiomatic: The eleventh month: the pitchpipe in the middle is Huangzhong.

sentences.zh: 黃鐘者，陽氣踵黃泉而出也。

translations.literal: Huangzhong ones, yang qi follows yellow springs and emerges also.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為子。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is zi.

sentences.zh: 子者，滋也；

translations.literal: Zi ones, nourish also;

sentences.zh: 滋者，言萬物滋於下也。

translations.literal: Nourish ones, speak ten thousand things nourish below also.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為壬癸。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers is Ren Gui.

sentences.zh: 壬之為言任也，言陽氣任養萬物於下也。

translations.literal: Ren of speak bear also, speak yang qi bears nourishes ten thousand things below also.

sentences.zh: 癸之為言揆也，言萬物可揆度，故曰癸。

translations.literal: Gui of speak measure also, speak ten thousand things can measure degree, therefore called Gui.

sentences.zh: 東至牽牛。

translations.literal: East until Ox Leader.

sentences.zh: 牽牛者，言陽氣牽引萬物出之也。

translations.literal: Ox Leader ones, speak yang qi pulls leads ten thousand things emerge it also.

sentences.zh: 牛者，冒也，言地雖凍，能冒而生也。

translations.literal: Ox ones, brave also, speak earth though frozen, able brave and live also.

sentences.zh: 牛者，耕植種萬物也。

translations.literal: Ox ones, plow plant sow ten thousand things also.

sentences.zh: 東至於建星。

translations.literal: East until Jian Star.

sentences.zh: 建星者，建諸生也。

translations.literal: Jian Star ones, establish various living also.

sentences.zh: 十二月也，律中大呂。

translations.literal: Twelfth month also, pitchpipe middle Dali.

sentences.zh: 大呂者。

translations.literal: Dali ones.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為醜。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Chou.

Guang Mo wind dwells north. Guang Mo, speak yang qi at below, yin cannot yang vast great, thus Guang Mo. East to Xu. Each according its bell diameter inspect with stopped fen make it. Qi begins winter solstice, circle return born.

sentences.zh: 神生於無，形成於有，形然後數，形而成聲，故曰神使氣，氣就形。

translations.literal: Spirit lives from nothing, forms from having, form then numbers, form then becomes sound, therefore called spirit makes qi, qi approaches form.

sentences.zh: 形理如類有可類。

translations.literal: Form principle like categories have what can categorize.

sentences.zh: 或未形而未類，或同形而同類，類而可班，類而可識。

translations.literal: Either not yet formed and not yet categorized, or same form and same category, categorize and can arrange, categorize and can recognize.

sentences.zh: 聖人知天地識之別，故從有以至未有，以得細若氣，微若聲。

translations.literal: Sages know heaven earth recognize their distinction, therefore from having reach not having, to obtain fine like qi, subtle like sound.

sentences.zh: 然聖人因神而存之，雖妙必效情，核其華道者明矣。

translations.literal: Yet sages follow spirit and preserve it, though marvelous must imitate emotions, examine their flowery way ones clear already.

sentences.zh: 非有聖心以乘聰明，孰能存天地之神而成形之情哉？

translations.literal: Not having sage heart to ride intelligence wisdom, who can preserve heaven earth spirit and complete form emotions?

sentences.zh: 神者，物受之而不能知（及）其去來，故聖人畏而欲存之。

translations.literal: Spirit ones, things receive it but cannot know their coming going, therefore sages fear and desire preserve it.

sentences.zh: 唯欲存之，神之亦存。

translations.literal: Only desire preserve it, spirit it also preserves.

sentences.zh: 其欲存之者，故莫貴焉。

translations.literal: Their desire preserve it ones, therefore nothing precious there.

Upper nine with lower nine all empty number, empty number, accumulate solid number as denominator, with upper nine lower nine as method. Thus upper nine, bell already upper born, lower nine, bell already lower born. Bell already upper born clear double half, bell already lower born clear not half. Sage know heaven earth know distinction, thus from have reach not have, with get fine like qi, subtle like sound. Yet sage according spirit store it, though wonderful must effect feelings, examine its flower way clear. Pitches divide twelve, even qi divide twenty four. Spirit, things receive it cannot know its go come, thus sage fear desire store it. Twenty four pitches zhun, zhun, thus even tune qi. Jun, thus level.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：（故）［在］旋璣玉衡以齊七政，即天地二十八宿。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: In whirling jade balance to align seven governments, namely heaven earth twenty eight lodgings.

sentences.zh: 十母，十二子，鐘律調自上古。

translations.literal: Ten mothers, twelve children, bell pitchpipes harmonize from high antiquity.

sentences.zh: 建律運歷造日度，可據而度也。

translations.literal: Establish pitchpipes move calendar make sun degrees, can rely and measure also.

sentences.zh: 合符節，通道德，即從斯之謂也。

translations.literal: Combine tally sections, connect morality virtue, namely follow this of called also.

Grand Historian says: In Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven govern, then heaven earth twenty eight lodges. Weigh thus level light heavy. Build pitch transport calendar make day degree, can according measure. Combine tally sections, connect morality way, then from this called.
